name: Sprout Prototype
description:
A game by Winston Powell and Alexander Bascom

Sprout encourages you to experiment with the world around them as it takes on a life of its own and instils a childlike sense of wonder! What starts as an empty landscape soon becomes a living and growing habitat to many types of plants and animals.

This game jam project has become the prototype for a fully fledged game called Sprout. An early version of that game can also be downloaded here on itch.io: acornbringer.itch.io/sprout

Controls

  • "WASD" moves the character around
  • "LMB" interacts with the environment
  • "RMB" collects items
  • "MMB" cycles through items
  • "0" will stop time
  • "+" will send time forward
  • "-" will send it back.
  • If you hold those down, time will change faster and faster.
  • "Enter" will show a little number in the top left if you want to see the speed
  • "Esc" will close the game
